attributes.action: RFA Long Service medal date of qualification
attributes.additional_details:
I served in the RFA from 1956 to 1990 so was not eligable even after
34 years.
People today are being awarded the medal after only 20 years service.
attributes.background: Petition HM the Queen to alter the date of qualification for the RFA LS &GC medal from August 2000 to prior.

rejection.details: The Royal Fleet Auxiliary Service Medal was established by royal warrant, and decisions about eligibility for the medal are a matter for the crown, not the Government or House of Commons.
